ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and vie with the others (in carrying out their Lord's behests);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: by the angels who hasten along
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then those who are foremost going ahead,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: by those that outstrip them suddenly,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And then they speed with foremost speed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: by those who, racing, take the lead,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then press forward as in a race,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And by those that press forward as in a race (i.e. the angels or stars or the horses, etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And those who race each other in a race
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:4] by those that race forward, [by] the angels who race forward to Paradise with the souls of believers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (By the angels hastening) and He swears by the angels who hasten to Paradise with the souls of the believers and to the Fire with the souls of the disbelievers; it is also said this refers to the souls of the believers that hasten to Paradise,
